name: Sewer Stash
description:
Controls -

WASD for Movement

Left Mouse for Dialog!

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Sewer Stash was made for Mini Jam 98, with the theme of EMPTY and the limitation of MAKE IT A ROGUELIKE!

Help Sewer Steve collect up a stash of gems for Boogie. That's pretty much it! Oh yeah, try not to get killed in the process!

Feedback always welcome, and thanks for playing!
